verbose_text: Increasing DNA damage inducible transcript 3 protein (CHOP), binding immunoglobulin protein (BIP) and caspase-12 expression levels upregulated by resistant starch diet may contribute to the resistant starch induced apoptosis of colon tumor cells induced by 1,2-dimethylhydrazine.
evidence: DNA damage-inducible transcript 3 protein (CHOP), binding immunoglobulin protein (BIP) and caspase-12 expression levels upregulated by resistant starch diet may contribute to the resistant starch-induced apoptosis
